name: Idle Workout Fitness
description:
Welcome to Idle Workout Fitness- a brand new idle game!
You are a personal trainer of a gym studio and your mission is to help your weak and obese clients to become fit through various cardio and muscle exercises.
Features:
- User friendly interface
- Realistic simulation of a gym center
- 15+ cardio and muscle exercises
- Amazing 3D graphics and addictive gameplay
- Upgrade your gym center to attract more customers
Download Idle Workout Fitness now and Get ready to immerse yourself into a realistic workout sessions!!!
